Easy Garlic Butter Shrimp

Ingredients

1 lb shrimp
4 cloves garlic
1/4 cup butter
Lemon juice

How to Make It?

Melt butter in a pan and add minced garlic. Add shrimp and cook until they turn pink. Squeeze lemon juice over the shrimp before serving.
